email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Hope you're doing well. We have the OCEAN MASTER (DWT: 145000, LOA: 320m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. Cargo size is 85000MT on CIF terms. Starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. Laycan is 25-30 Oct. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the quote. USD 18.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Cheers,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 28 Oct - 02 Nov?

Cheers,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 28 Oct - 02 Nov. Please confirm.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: OCEAN MASTER
- Cargo: 85000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 28 Oct - 02 Nov
- Freight: USD 17.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Summary of Terms - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Looks good. Just one thing: can we confirm the loading window is 72 hours?

Cheers,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Summary of Terms - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Yes, loading window is 72 hours. All other terms remain as per the summary. Let me know if you need anything else.

Best,
Sarah
